channel.title: Ios on Fairese
channel.description: Recent content in Ios on Fairese

item.title: Fairese Prepares to Release a Major Update to Its Beloved Anime-Tracking App Silvianna After Years in Development
item.description: Silvianna 26 launches October 28 — introducing a refreshed Liquid Glass design, remade widgets, smarter search, and a redesigned app icon inspired by its original mascot.

item.title: Silvianna 26
item.description: Silvianna 26 is a complete rebuild of Fairese’s beloved AniList client for iOS, redesigned with Apple’s Liquid Glass aesthetic, modern Swift Concurrency, and a renewed focus on effortless anime tracking.
